subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox’ Alex Cora is a backup, er, utility infielder who waits more than he plays. But like so many players who have made the ultimate difference in the playoffs, he must be ready to produce at a moment’s notice.
snippet: The Red Sox’ Alex Cora is a backup, er, utility infielder who waits more than he plays. But like so many players who have made the ultimate difference in the playoffs, he must be ready to produce at a moment’s notice.
